name: VirtualDog
description: App to demo AngularJs, Jasmine, TypeScript, and associated techs

scripts.postinstall: bower install && typings install && echo Typings Installation version && typings -v && tsc && echo TypeScript Compilation version && tsc -v
scripts.bower-typings: bower install && typings install && echo Typings Installation version && typings -v

author: Tony Curtis
